text: Earnings Call Insights: Simulations Plus (SLP) Q3 2025 Management View CEO Shawn M. O'Connor reported, "Third quarter revenue came in slightly above our preliminary range communicated in June. Final results showed revenue growth of 10% to $20.4 million, including a $2.4 million contribution from the Pro-ficiency acquisition. Management View

  • CEO Shawn M. O'Connor reported, "Third quarter revenue came in slightly above our preliminary range communicated in June. Final results showed revenue growth of 10% to $20.4 million, including a $2.4 million contribution from the Pro-ficiency acquisition. On
